item.description:
I know this is a short notice, but realized would be a great way to meet new desis in the group and enjoy the all time fav and amazing rides at SIX flags..

We (approx 8-9), are planning to book tickets online, leave around 10 am on Sat (1 aug) and come back after dinner.
Those interested in joining please follow the same regime and are free to leave whenever.
There are various discounts for the tickets booked online, eg for AAA members, some company providers, even coke cans?!!

This would be great way of making new Indian friends, hang out and have a blast!
item.name: SIX FLAGS!!
